p: Phylogenetic analysis carried out for HIV-1 isolated in different Siberian regions led to the conclusion that there were at least two independent HIV-1 CRF63_02A1 transmissions to Krasnoyarsk Krai from Tomsk Oblast and Kemerovo Oblast. The complex of data on the detection of phylogenetic clustering and analysis of subtype-specific HIV-1 polymorphism points out that, in Krasnoyarsk Krai, its region specific HIV-1 CRF63_02A1 population of variants with specific differences in genome nucleotide sequences has begun to spread, as well.
